languages.text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Псайкер вытягивает жизнь из цели, нанося ей <u>(2 × уровень посоха × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и восстанавливая себе и всем своим союзникам <u>(2 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. В конце следующего хода псайкера все его союзники потеряют <u>(4 × уровень посоха псайкера)</u> здоровья, если бой к тому моменту не завершится.
При использовании этой {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the Psyker's allies and the Psyker themselves for <u>(2 × Psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the Psyker's next turn, all Psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × Psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over.
This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over.
This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text:
灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成{uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}。在灵能者的下个回合结束时，如果战斗依然没有结束，则灵能者所有盟友都会失去{uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}点生命值。
此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>点伤害，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（2×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>。在灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果战斗依然没有结束，则灵能者所有盟友都会失去<u>（4×灵能者法杖力量等级）</u>点生命值。
此灵能力量必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成{uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}。在灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果战斗依然没有结束，则灵能者所有盟友都会失去{uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}点生命值。
此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

灵能者汲取目标的生命，造成{uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时恢复灵能者与所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}。在灵能者的下个回合结束时，如果战斗依然没有结束，则灵能者所有盟友都会失去{uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}点生命值。
此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

languages.text:
El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Al final del próximo turno del psíquico, todos sus aliados perderán {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} heridas a menos que el combate haya acabado.
Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo <u>(2 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Al final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico, todos sus aliados perderán <u>(4 × nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico)</u> heridas a menos que el combate haya acabado.
Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

El psíquico drena la vida del objetivo para infligir {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y curar a todos los aliados del psíquico y a sí mismo {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Al final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico, todos sus aliados perderán {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} heridas a menos que el combate haya acabado.
Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text:
異能者がターゲットの生命力を吸収して{uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるとともに、異能者本人を含む仲間全員の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}の分だけ回復する。異能者の次のターンが終了する時点で戦闘が終了していなければ、異能者の仲間全員は{uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372}の傷を失う。
この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。

この超能力は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。

languages.text:
Der Psioniker entzieht dem Ziel Leben, wobei er ihm {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt und sämtliche Verbündeten des Psionikers und den Psioniker selbst um {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} heilt. Am Ende des nächsten Zugs des Psionikers verlieren alle seine Verbündeten {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} Wunden, es sei denn, der Kampf ist bereits vorbei.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.
languages.original_text:

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.

Am Ende des nächsten Zugs des Psionikers verlieren alle seine Verbündeten {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} Wunden, es sei denn, der Kampf ist bereits vorbei.

languages.text: Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et en soignant tous ses alliés ainsi que lui-même à hauteur de {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. À la fin du tour suivant du psyker, tous ses alliés perdent {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} blessures, sauf si le combat est déjà terminé. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level × (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for <u>(2 × psyker's staff power level)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all the psyker's allies will lose <u>(4 × psyker's staff power level)</u> wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> points de dégâts et en soignant tous ses alliés ainsi que lui-même à hauteur de <u>(2 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du psyker, tous ses alliés perdent <u>(4 × niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> blessures, sauf si le combat est déjà terminé.
Ce pouvoir psychique déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et en soignant tous ses alliés ainsi que lui-même à hauteur de {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du psyker, tous ses alliés perdent {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} blessures, sauf si le combat est déjà terminé. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

Le psyker puise les forces vitales de sa cible en lui infligeant {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et en soignant tous ses alliés ainsi que lui-même à hauteur de {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. À la fin du tour suivant du psyker, tous ses alliés perdent {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} blessures, sauf si le combat est déjà terminé. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text:
Ruhsezer, hedeften yaşam emer ve {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirken hem kendisini hem de dost birimlerini iyileştirerek {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanlarını tazeler. Ruhsezerin bir sonraki turu bittiğinde çatışma henüz sona ermemişse ruhsezerin dost birimleri {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} sağlık puanı kaybeder.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikler.
languages.original_text:
The psyker drains life from the target, dealing {uip|Damage|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing all the psyker's allies and the psyker themselves for {uip|Healing|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. At the end of the psyker's next turn, all the psyker's allies will lose {uip|Wounds|65791f6355c04864b890c9e964b9c372} wounds unless the combat is already over.
This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
